snippet: President Obama will make a brief trip to Mexico to forge closer trade ties with Mexico and Canada, as his party’s leaders in Congress vow to undercut his efforts.
abstract: Pres Obama will travel to Mexico for a brief but politically fraught visit aimed at forging closer trade ties with Mexico and Canada, even as his party's leaders back home have vowed to undercut his efforts.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and ELISABETH MALKIN
byline.contributor: Peter Baker reported from Washington, and Elisabeth Malkin from Mexico City.

lead_paragraph: President Obama will make a brief trip to Mexico to forge closer trade ties with Mexico and Canada, as his party’s leaders in Congress vow to undercut his efforts.

headline.main: Politics to Shadow Obama’s Trade Talks in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Politics to Shadow Obama’s Trade Talks in Mexico
